page_description: Top Axie Infinity players compete in tournaments and live events to win major prizes.
compete_txt1: Calling all Axie players! If you consider yourself to be a top player, why not register to compete in an upcoming Esports event? In addition to eternal glory, you might take home a sizable prize ranging from bags of crypto to rare Axies!
compete_txt2: The 2023 calendar is absolutely packed with exciting Axie Infinity Esports action from all around the globe.
compete_txt3: Still learning the ropes? Esports events are a great way to learn new strategies and connect with the community.
compete_txt4: Join the community, and join the action!
alert: Be sure to bookmark the schedules and check back often for new events!
